channel.title: Problem with my Black Dragon
channel.description:
Both EasyRSC and Noobscape (npcdef.xml is probably the same) I attack Black Dragon, Hit constant 0s till it eventually disappears taking me out of combat, leaving nothing
I've tried lowing the NPCS defence and HP.
Anyone have this problem or have a solution?

item.title: Problem with my Black Dragon
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

How about you just restore the files, you’ve clearly changed something else.

Just restore the file and tamper with the defenseive levels. If you change the HP change it in the client file aswell as it glitches.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with my Black Dragon

item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

solution- lower the dragons defence more till you are able to hit him, it is all trial and error
